entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Сhecking for NULL #92566
  • Property Attribute Not Returned By PropertyDescriptor Attributes #92565
  • FixedWindowRateLimiter miscalculates `Retry-After` value #92557
  • GetNonRandomizedHashCode produces too many collisions for small strings #92556
  • Should `JIT_UpdateWriteBarrierState` be in the patchable section or not? #92554
  • Is the `_TEST` section a typo? #92553
    9.0.0
  • <WasiAfterRuntimeLoaded> is broken in wasi-wasm workflow #92551

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: InitialCapacity for CborWriter #91978
    9.0.0
  • Standalone GC, GC_IsCompatibleWithRuntime(), building a standalone GC for multiple runtime versions #92536
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ref T MemoryMarshal.ReadRef<T>(ReadOnlySpan<byte>) API #92559
  • [API Proposal]: Hash and HMAC one-shots for HashAlgorithName #91407
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ObjectContentType to getObjectContent #92562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce 1 possible string allocation in `System.RuntimeType.SplitName` #92558
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Split off patched code into separate .S file and disable subsections-via-symbols for it #92555
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fixed the order of WASI_AFTER_RUNTIME_LOADED_CALLS #92552
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix memory leak in MemoryCache #92550
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 117.0.5938.92, windows: 117.0.5938.92 #92545
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Remove some nullchecks for frozen objects #92561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support SIMD sizes for remainders in store decomposition #92469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Reimport full spill clique for I_IMPL<->BYREF mismatches #92307
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed wrong comment in Marshalling/*Marshaller.cs #92563
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement InitialCapacity on CborWriter. #92538
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • Fixed broken ECMA links #92547
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix doc comment #92531
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Use invariant culture for CBOR #92539
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • HashAlgorithmName one-shots #92430
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Generate gsharedvt versions of the callvirt delegate invoke wr… #92472
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Switch to etw python script #92508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: Register field seqs for GC pointer constants in side table #92540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • The IConfiguration.GetSection method will not return null, call the IConfigurationSection.Exists extension method to determine. #91832
    area-Extensions-Logging, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • Clarify MatchAbbreviatedMonthName comment #92405
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Improve nullability check for generic `.ctor` parameters #92514
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Make CoreCLR/NativeAOT assembly compile with .subsections_via_symbols on Apple platforms #92544
    blocked, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • [.NET 8 Regression] error CS1504: Source file "<Path to XAML>" could not be opened --- Could not find file #34438
  • Add validation of the runtimeconfig.template.json file #35631
    Backlog
  • Make 'dotnet tool restore' Automatic #4241
  • Unable to build project using latest .NET sdk (Xamarin forms) #33705

PullRequests

Updated

  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Open issues for collection expression construction #7542

PullRequests

Updated

  • Collection expressions: construction #7541

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Syntax highlighting of unmanaged calling convention identifiers is not uniform #70107
  • Parameter help and parameter autocompletion are not shown when calling base primary constructor of abstract class #70106
  • Codegen for nested `if`s can be improved #70105

Closed

  • `nint` and `nuint` are suggested as keywords in an attribute list #70074

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix signature-help/completion with primary constructors #70110
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Merge pull request #70065 from CyrusNajmabadi/revertOOP" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic classification of function pointer types #70108
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change completion sorting to use ArrayBuilder instead of SegmentedList #70103
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Do not show `nint` and `nuint` in attribute name context #70104
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Change AssemblyData.AvailableSymbols to ImmutableArray instead of IEnumerable #70087
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Don't treat user-defined casts as constants in analyzers for "use pattern matching" and "convert if to switch" #69458
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add a struct enumerator for NodeStateTable<T> #70082
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: simplify SymbolMatcher #70084
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Use raw strings in regex tests #70098
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize `T ?? null` to `T` where `T` is a reference type #69803
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Do not offer to convert AsSpan on lvalues to collection expressions #70102
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Don't recreate whole completion item upon calculation of properties. #70097
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Identity Endpoints API - Optional "CallbackUrl" #50904
  • Perf improvement: single_query, updates #50903
  • Perf improvement: json #50901
  • AntiforgeryStateProvider always returns a null token in WebAssemblyPrerendered mode #50900
  • What custom tool that Identity core use for generate `.resx` *.Designer.cs file? #50899

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #50902
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #50897
  • Perf improvement: caching #50889
  • Minimal API endpoints accepting IFormFile terminating with HTTP 200 for large files #50871

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/8.0-rc2] [Blazor] Improvements to SSR component activation #50848
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2275191 #50824
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RefreshView indicator hidden behind Navigation bar #17610
  • [Android] - Layouting and Coloring of Grid Items in CollectionView wrong when rotating to different orientations #17609
  • Pending Navigations still processing exception when navigating to the page #17608

Closed

  • Border bugs entries #17506
    .NET 8 GA
  • Shell Tabbar Tab Title Selected Text Color & Choppy Animation On Windows #17378

PullRequests

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix legacy logical children to correctly add/remove #17410
    t/bug, control-swipeview, .NET 9 Planning
  • Fix menu item command binding (#13848) #14345
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-menubar, stale, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Update Flyout when Shell.FlyoutContent changes #17359
    area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed Android's Border background to use a Transparent bg if not othe… #17555
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Recreate Details Fragment, if its been destroyed #17604
    .NET 8 GA
  • Recreate the Navigation Host If It's been Destroyed #17594
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix tab colors not updating on add/remove #17591
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, area/desktop 🖥️, .NET 8 GA
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 GA
  • Update SkiaSharp to the latest stable version #17558
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix typo in build.sh #17305
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, stale
  • [main] Build the previous .NET version of some nugets #17043
    area/architecture, stale, Under Consideration
  • Make ALL template warnings show up as test errors (not just C# warnings), and produce more diagnostic artifacts #17586
    do-not-merge, area/templates 📄
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17595
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Issues
